document.full_text: japan's government said on tuesday it would not set an initial limit on tokyo electric power's liability for damages caused by its leaking fukushima daiichi nuclear plant and said the utility must tighten its belt further.
document.title: japan government: tepco faces unlimited liability for crisis
lines_and_colors: japan's government said on tuesday it would not set an initial limit on tokyo electric power's liability for damages caused by its leaking fukushima daiichi nuclear plant and said the utility must tighten its belt further.
